file_content.text: Fine, okay! Whatever happened to asking nicely?
There's a lot I'll put up with, but definitely not that!
Normally, I charge for information. For you? On the house.
You're either an idiot or a moron, and I don't care which!
Right. Like no one'll find out I squealed? Pass.
I like your style. Let me see if I can't be of service.
You picked the wrong lowlife to cozy up to!
"You're so nice! I'll tell you everything!" Feh. Not a chance.
